Topic.Title: Lbix and blueberrys help loose weight.

Message.Msg: You know what else helps lose weight? Exercise.

Topic.Title: HFCS is poison, do not drink this garbage!!!

Message.Msg: What other companies are you hammering with your rhetoric since the CDC announced their findings that 70% of our daily "sugar" intake comes from food, so focusing on soft drinks would be ignorant? Assuming you read that information, since you pretend to be oh so wise.
